name: Search_Car_Rentals

pick_up_latitude.description: The pick up location's latitude. pick_up_latitude can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchDestination(Search Car Location) endpoint in Car Rental collection as latitude inside coordinates object.

pick_up_longitude.description: The pick up location's longitude. pick_up_longitude can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchDestination(Search Car Location) endpoint in Car Rental collection as longitude inside coordinates object.

drop_off_latitude.description: The drop off location's latitude. drop_off_latitude can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchDestination(Search Car Location) endpoint in Car Rental collection as latitude inside coordinates object.

drop_off_longitude.description: The drop off location's longitude. drop_off_longitude can be retrieved from api/v1/cars/searchDestination(Search Car Location) endpoint in Car Rental collection as longitude inside coordinates object.

pick_up_time.description:
Pick up time
Format: HH:MM
Note: The format of time is 24 hours.

drop_off_time.description:
Drop off time
Format: HH:MM
Note: The format of time is 24 hours.

driver_age.description:
The driver's age. The default value is set to 30.
Note: The driver age must be in the range of 20 to 65 years.

filters.description:
Used to refine search results based on specific suppliers, car categories, or other attributes. Multiple filters can be applied by passing them as a comma-separated list in the following format:
::
For example:
supplier::Avis,supplier::Budget,carCategory::medium,carCategory::large
This will return results from Avis and Budget, and only cars in the medium and large categories.
To discover available filters, make a request to the /api/v1/cars/searchCarRentals endpoint and refer to the data → filter section in the response.

languagecode.description:
To obtain the response data in a specific language, enter the languagecode. languagecode can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLanguages(Get Languages
) endpoint in Meta collection.

currency_code.description: The currency code. currency_code can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getCurrency(Get Currency) endpoint in Hotels collection.

location.description: location can be retrieved from api/v1/meta/getLocations(Get Location) endpoint in Meta collection.

accessibility.supplier_rating: At this location, our customers have rated Budget as 7.6 out of 10, Good.

response_summary:
Here’s a summary of the car rental options available for your trip:  

You have a total of 75 rental options to choose from, with prices starting at ₹54,122 for a 6-day rental. Three standout options include:  

1. **Chrysler Pacifica** – A spacious 7-seater mini car with automatic transmission and unlimited mileage, available for rent from Avis at ₹75,074.07. It has a "Good" supplier rating of 7.6 based on 33 reviews and offers free cancellation. Pickup is from Manhattan’s West 31st Street, with drop-off at Logan International Airport in Boston.  

2. **Toyota Corolla** – An intermediate car with 5 seats, automatic transmission, and unlimited mileage, offered by Budget for ₹54,612.87. It includes a premium package with a free additional driver and a full tank of fuel. Rated 7.6 by 27 reviewers, it also allows free cancellation and can be picked up in Fort Lee, New Jersey.  

3. **Kia Soul** – A compact 5-seater with automatic transmission and unlimited mileage, priced at ₹52,849.21. Like the Corolla, it comes with Budget’s premium package and free cancellation. It shares the same pickup location in Fort Lee and has identical ratings.  

All three vehicles support free amendments and have no hidden fees, though deposits ranging from $250 to $300 may apply. You can filter results by car type (small, medium, large), supplier (Avis or Budget), or price range (₹5,000–₹15,000 per day). Sorting options include "Best First," "Lowest Price," or "Highest Rating."  

Pickup locations are conveniently spread across Manhattan, including West 31st Street, West 43rd Street, and East 64th Street, with competitive pricing across the board.
enhance_func_desc: This API is ideal for travelers seeking car rental options for their trips. It searches available rental cars based on pickup/drop-off locations, dates, and times, with filtering options for suppliers, car categories, and more. Users receive detailed rental information including pricing, vehicle specifications, supplier ratings, and cancellation policies. The response can be sorted by best matches, price, or ratings, helping users find the most suitable rental for their needs.

enhanced_parameters.pick_up_latitude: Latitude coordinate for the car pickup location.
enhanced_parameters.pick_up_longitude: Longitude coordinate for the car pickup location.
enhanced_parameters.drop_off_latitude: Latitude coordinate for the car drop-off location.
enhanced_parameters.drop_off_longitude: Longitude coordinate for the car drop-off location.
enhanced_parameters.pick_up_date: Date when the car rental begins (YYYY-MM-DD).
enhanced_parameters.drop_off_date: Date when the car rental ends (YYYY-MM-DD).
enhanced_parameters.pick_up_time: Time when the car rental begins (24-hour HH:MM format).
enhanced_parameters.drop_off_time: Time when the car rental ends (24-hour HH:MM format).
enhanced_parameters.filters: Filters results by supplier, car category, or other attributes.
enhanced_parameters.languagecode: Language preference for the response data.
enhanced_parameters.location: Country or region code for location-specific results.

search_results.description: List of car rental options available for the search criteria.

content.description: Additional content related to the vehicle, including badges, supplier details, and vehicle specifications.

badges.description: List of badges associated with the vehicle, such as 'Free cancellation'.

text.description: Text displayed on the badge, e.g., 'Free cancellation'.

supplier.description: Details about the supplier of the vehicle.

imageUrl.description: URL of the supplier's logo image.

rawValue.description: Raw numerical value of the rating.

displayValue.description: Display value of the rating, e.g., '7.6'.

subtitle.description: Subtitle providing additional context, e.g., '33 reviews'.

vehicleSpecs.description: List of vehicle specifications, such as transmission type and mileage policy.

text.description: Text description of the specification, e.g., 'Automatic'.

accessibility.description: Accessibility description for the specification, e.g., 'Automatic gearbox'.

v_name.description: Name of the vehicle, e.g., 'Chrysler Pacifica'.

unlimited_mileage.description: Indicates if the vehicle has unlimited mileage (1 for yes, 0 for no).

special_offer_text.description: Text describing any special offers, e.g., 'Premium Package: price includes 1 additional driver and the first tank of fuel free'.

seats.description: Number of seats in the vehicle, e.g., '7'.

suitcases.description: Number of suitcases the vehicle can accommodate.

label.description: Label describing the vehicle category, e.g., 'Mini car with:'.

insurance_package.description: Details about the insurance package, if any.

image_thumbnail_url.description: URL of the vehicle's thumbnail image.

group_or_similar.description: Description of the vehicle group or similar, e.g., 'or similar people carrier'.

fuel_type.description: Type of fuel the vehicle uses, e.g., 'N/A'.

free_cancellation.description: Indicates if free cancellation is available (1 for yes, 0 for no).

cma_compliant.description: Indicates if the vehicle is CMA compliant (-1 for unknown, 1 for yes, 0 for no).

aircon.description: Indicates if the vehicle has air conditioning (1 for yes, 0 for no).

airbags.description: Indicates if the vehicle has airbags (1 for yes, 0 for no).

badges.description: Additional badges associated with the vehicle.

address.description: Full address of the pickup location.

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate of the pickup location.

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of the pickup location.

may_require_credit_card_guarantee.description: Indicates if a credit card guarantee may be required.

route_info.description: Information about the pickup and drop-off locations.

name.description: Name of the pickup location, e.g., 'Manhattan - West 31st Street'.

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of the pickup location.

location_id.description: Unique identifier for the pickup location.

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate of the pickup location.

country_code.description: Country code of the pickup location, e.g., 'US'.

country.description: Country name of the pickup location.

address.description: Full address of the pickup location.

name.description: Name of the drop-off location, e.g., 'Logan International Airport'.

longitude.description: Longitude coordinate of the drop-off location.

location_id.description: Unique identifier for the drop-off location.

latitude.description: Latitude coordinate of the drop-off location.

country_code.description: Country code of the drop-off location, e.g., 'US'.

country.description: Country name of the drop-off location.

address.description: Full address of the drop-off location.

location_hash.description: Hash representing the drop-off location, if available.

rating_info.description: Rating information for the vehicle and supplier.

average_text.description: Text description of the average rating, e.g., 'Very good'.

value_for_money.description: Rating for the value for money.

fee_info.description: Information about fees associated with the rental.

freebies.description: List of freebies included with the rental, e.g., 'Amendments'.

pricing_info.description: Detailed pricing information for the rental.

base_price.description: Base price of the rental in INR.

drive_away_price_is_approx.description: Indicates if the drive-away price is approximate.

base_currency.description: Currency of the base price, e.g., 'INR'.

quote_allowed.description: Indicates if a quote is allowed (1 for yes, 0 for no).

fee_breakdown.description: Breakdown of fees associated with the rental.

amount.description: Amount associated with the fuel policy.

currency.description: Currency of the fuel policy amount.

known_fees.description: List of known fees associated with the rental.

distance_allowed.description: Distance allowed for the fee, if applicable.

is_always_payable.description: Indicates if the fee is always payable (1 for yes, 0 for no).

is_tax_included.description: Indicates if tax is included in the fee (1 for yes, 0 for no).

fuel_policy.description: Fuel policy description, e.g., 'Fuel policy is: Like for like'.

supplier_rating.description: Supplier rating description, e.g., 'At this location, our customers have rated Avis as 7.6 out of 10, Good.'.

pick_up_location.description: Pick-up location information, e.g., 'Pick-up information: Downtown'.

applied_discount_types.description: List of applied discount types, if any.

content.description: Additional content related to the search results.

positionInList.description: Position of the item in the list.

label.description: Label for the content, e.g., '75 results'.

countLabel.description: Label showing the count of results, e.g., '75 results'.

supplierLocations.description: List of supplier locations on the map.

title.description: Title of the location, e.g., 'Manhattan - West 31st Street'.

body.description: Body text, e.g., '220, West 31st Street, Manhattan, USA, 10001'.

label.description: Footer label, e.g., 'Price for 6 days: from ₹ 54,122'.

supplierPinContent.description: Content for the supplier pin on the map.

locationName.description: Name of the location, e.g., 'Manhattan - West 31st Street'.

filter.description: List of filters available for the search results.

title.description: Title of the filter, e.g., 'Car Type'.

id.description: Unique identifier for the filter, e.g., 'carCategory'.

is_collapsable.description: Indicates if the filter is collapsable ('true' or 'false').

is_collapsed.description: Indicates if the filter is collapsed ('true' or 'false').

collapsed_count.description: Number of items shown when collapsed.

categories.description: List of categories within the filter.

id.description: Unique identifier for the category, e.g., 'carCategory::small'.

count.description: Number of items in the category.

sort.description: List of sorting options for the search results.

name.description: Name of the sorting option, e.g., 'Recommended – best first'.

identifier.description: Unique identifier for the sorting option, e.g., 'recommended'.

title_tag.description: Title tag for the sorting option, e.g., 'tr.searchresults.sortBy.recommended'.

search_key.description: Encoded search key for the current search.

recommendationsSearchUniqueId.description: Unique identifier for the recommendations search.

count.description: Total number of search results, e.g., 75.

is_genius_location.description: Indicates if the location is a Genius location.
